attributes.action: use the navy to sail up the British channel and blockade the boats coming over
attributes.background: I want to government to take a proactive stance  use a naval blockade to prevent small boats crossing the channel so we have time to process people

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769)
